list.en: Should I write down every word that everyone says?
list.cn: 我应该把每个人说的每句话都记下来吗?

list.en: Would you please check on the availability of the conference room for that day?
list.cn: 你能帮我查一下那天的会议室是否有空吗?

list.en: I am trying to arrange a meeting for this week.
list.cn: 我想在本周安排一次会议。

list.en: Is the room ready for the conference?
list.cn: 会议室准备好了吗?

list.en: Let's set the meeting up at eight o'clock on monday morning.
list.cn: 我们把会议定在星期一早上八点。

list.en: How about the microphone and speakers?
list.cn: 麦克风和扬声器准备好了吗?

list.en: I want to know if everything is going well for tomorrow's meeting.
list.cn: 我想知道明天的会议是否一切顺利。

list.en: You get the computer and projector ready.
list.cn: 你准备好电脑和投影仪。

list.en: I hope that you prepare a short speech for the meeting.
list.cn: 我希望你为会议准备一个简短的发言。

list.en: Did you inform her of the meeting time?
list.cn: 你通知她会议时间了吗?

list.en: Could you please call and remind the attendees?
list.cn: 你能打电话提醒一下与会者吗?

list.en: I will send meeting notice to the different departments.
list.cn: 我会把会议通知发给各个部门。

list.en: Please draft a notice for the meeting.
list.cn: 请起草一份会议通知。

list.en: Please inform them about the meeting location.
list.cn: 请通知他们会议地点。

list.en: Let's write a notice of the meeting for next monday.
list.cn: 咱们写一份下周一开会的通知吧。

list.en: Please notify the relevant section chiefs.
list.cn: 请通知有关科长。

list.en: We are used to phone or email notification.
list.cn: 我们习惯于电话或电子邮件通知。

list.en: The meeting in the afternoon will be held in the conference room.
list.cn: 下午的会议将在会议室举行。

list.en: All the members received duplicated notices of the meeting.
list.cn: 所有成员都收到了重复的会议通知。

list.en: I've got the notice of the meeting already.
list.cn: 我已经收到开会通知了。

list.en: Why were you absent this afternoon?
list.cn: 你今天下午为什么缺席?

list.en: Could you tell me the reason why you were absent from the meeting?
list.cn: 你能告诉我你缺席会议的原因吗?

list.en: You killed further discussion with your absence.
list.cn: 你的缺席扼杀了进一步的讨论。

list.en: You get demerits if you Miss a meeting.
list.cn: 如果你缺席会议，你会被记过的。

list.en: We will hold a meeting this afternoon. Please attend it on time.
list.cn: 今天下午我们要开会。请准时参加。

list.en: All of us were guessing why our manager was absent from this important meeting.
list.cn: 我们大家都在猜测经理为什么缺席这个重要的会议。

list.en: The committee demands that no member would be absent.
list.cn: 委员会要求委员不得缺席。

list.en: No one believes the reason that he gave us about his absence at the meeting.
list.cn: 没有人相信他给我们的缺席会议的理由。

list.en: The people absent must make up for the meeting.
list.cn: 缺席的人必须补上会议。

list.en: The meeting had to be put off due to his absence.
list.cn: 由于他缺席，会议不得不推迟。

list.en: He is always absent from the meeting.
list.cn: 他总是缺席会议。

list.en: Anyone who absence from the meeting will be fined.
list.cn: 任何缺席会议的人都将被罚款。

list.en: He is always looking for excuses to be absent from the meeting.
list.cn: 他总是找借口不出席会议。

list.en: He comes to meetings on time, every time.
list.cn: 他每次都准时参加会议。

list.en: Some staff are absent today.
list.cn: 今天有些员工缺席。

list.en: He absented himself from a meeting yesterday.
list.cn: 他昨天缺席了一个会议。

list.en: He is conspicuously not present at the meeting.
list.cn: 他显然没有出席会议。

list.en: His absence puts off the meeting.
list.cn: 他的缺席推迟了会议。

list.en: Would you like to sit in on the meeting?
list.cn: 你想旁听会议吗?

list.en: May I sit in on it?
list.cn: 我可以旁听吗?

list.en: Do you mind if I sit in on the meeting?
list.cn: 你介意我旁听会议吗?

list.en: How long did you sit in on the meeting?
list.cn: 你旁听了多长时间的会议?

list.en: What do you learn by sitting in on the meeting?
list.cn: 你从旁听会议中学到了什么?

list.en: Please invite all our clients to the conference next week.
list.cn: 请邀请我们所有的客户参加下周的会议。

list.en: Please print out the meeting agenda for me to look over.
list.cn: 请把会议议程打印出来给我看一下。

list.en: Please print out the meeting agenda for me to look over.
list.cn: 请把会议议程打印出来给我看一下。

list.en: At every meeting, the Chairman will sit in on the meeting.
list.cn: 每次会议，主席都要列席会议。

list.en: He also gave some useful advices when he was sitting in on the meeting.
list.cn: 他在旁听会议时也提了一些有益的建议。

list.en: The manager agrees his requirements of sitting in on the meeting.
list.cn: 经理同意了他列席会议的要求。

list.en: I will be observing today.
list.cn: 今天由我来观察。

list.en: Who is responsible for writing the meeting minutes?
list.cn: 谁负责写会议记录?

list.en: Could you please give everyone a copy of the meeting minutes?
list.cn: 你能给每个人发一份会议记录吗?

list.en: Could you make the minutes in both Chinese and English?
list.cn: 你能用中文和英文做会议记录吗?

list.en: Will you take minutes at the meeting in the afternoon?
list.cn: 请你在下午的会议上做记录好吗?

list.en: To make a record of the meeting is very important.
list.cn: 把会议记录下来是很重要的。

list.en: Let's review the minutes from last meeting.
list.cn: 让我们回顾一下上次会议的记录。

list.en: I have read through the minutes of the last meeting.
list.cn: 我已经通读了上次会议的记录。

list.en: You should appoint a secretary to take meeting notes.
list.cn: 你应该指派一名秘书做会议记录。

list.en: I have to take minutes of every meeting.
list.cn: 每次会议我都要做记录。

list.en: You must learn how to take minutes.
list.cn: 你必须学会如何做会议记录。

list.en: Let's go to the next topic.
list.cn: 让我们进入下一个话题。

list.en: We will now proceed to the panel discussion.
list.cn: 我们现在开始小组讨论。

list.en: Does anyone have anything to add?
list.cn: 有人要补充什么吗?

list.en: I hope that everyone participates in today's discussion.
list.cn: 我希望大家都参加今天的讨论。

list.en: I would like to get everyone's opinion on the issue.
list.cn: 我想听听大家对这个问题的看法。

list.en: Now let's come to the final issue.
list.cn: 现在我们来看最后一个问题。

list.en: Let me deal with the differences first.
list.cn: 让我先处理一下差异。

list.en: May we have your opinion?
list.cn: 能听听你的意见吗?

list.en: I'm afraid I can't agree with you.
list.cn: 恐怕我不能同意你的看法。

list.en: Do we have a meeting agenda?
list.cn: 我们有会议议程吗?

list.en: Is there a meeting agenda?
list.cn: 有会议议程吗?

list.en: Let's discuss the meeting agenda in detail first.
list.cn: 我们先详细讨论一下会议议程吧。

list.en: Do you think it necessary to add this item to the agenda?
list.cn: 你认为有必要把这个项目列入议程吗?

list.en: I will send the meeting agenda for your reference.
list.cn: 我会把会议议程发给你参考。

list.en: Let's go through the agenda quickly.
list.cn: 让我们快速浏览一下议程。

list.en: Let's proceed to the next item on the agenda.
list.cn: 让我们进行议程上的下一项。

list.en: If there is no objection, the agenda is adopted.
list.cn: 如果没有人反对，就通过议程。

list.en: There are some changes in the meeting agenda, so I have to redo this.
list.cn: 会议议程有些变动，所以我得重做一遍。

list.en: The next step will be to draw up a meeting agenda.
list.cn: 下一步将是拟定会议议程。

list.en: The meeting agenda should be clear.
list.cn: 会议议程应该明确。

list.en: There are altogether three items on the agenda.
list.cn: 议程上总共有三个项目。

list.en: Issues to be discussed on the agenda include five aspects.
list.cn: 本次会议拟讨论的议题包括五个方面。

list.en: Are there any other issues that we need to discuss today?
list.cn: 我们今天还有其他问题需要讨论吗?

list.en: Can you recap the meeting briefly?
list.cn: 你能简单回顾一下会议吗?

list.en: When will we have the next meeting?
list.cn: 我们下次会议什么时候开?

list.en: Did we Miss anything on the agenda?
list.cn: 我们有错过什么吗?

list.en: We have to finish today's discussion now.
list.cn: 我们现在得结束今天的讨论了。

list.en: Let's discuss it in more detail tomorrow.
list.cn: 我们明天再详细讨论吧。

list.en: Before we close, let me summarize the main point.
list.cn: 在我们结束之前，让我总结一下要点。

list.en: If nobody wants to add anything, we can draw the meeting to a close.
list.cn: 如果没有人想补充什么，会议就到此结束。

list.en: All scheduled programs have been completed.
list.cn: 所有预定的节目都已完成。

list.en: Thank you for your participation.
list.cn: 谢谢你的参与。

list.en: If there is nothing else, the meeting is finished.
list.cn: 如果没有别的，会议就结束了。

list.en: Please give further attention to the topics we have discussed today.
list.cn: 请进一步注意我们今天讨论的话题。

list.en: I would like to end this meeting now.
list.cn: 我想现在结束这次会议。

list.en: Let's call it a day, shall we?
list.cn: 今天就到此为止吧，好吗?

list.en: What's the reason of canceling the meeting?
list.cn: 取消会议的原因是什么?

list.en: Why not cancel the meeting?
list.cn: 为什么不取消会议呢?

list.en: We could put off the meeting or cancel it.
list.cn: 我们可以推迟或取消会议。

list.en: I prefer to call off the meeting on account of boss's absence.
list.cn: 因为老板不在，我宁愿取消会议。

list.en: They would be very reluctant to postpone or cancel the meeting.
list.cn: 他们很不愿意推迟或取消会议。

list.en: We had to put the meeting off since so many people were absent.
list.cn: 由于这么多人缺席，我们不得不推迟会议。

list.en: Our boss called to cancel the meeting.
list.cn: 我们老板打电话来取消会议。

list.en: We will have to cancel the meeting.
list.cn: 我们将不得不取消会议。

list.en: Please inform to cancel the meeting and send everyone a report.
list.cn: 请通知取消会议，并给每个人发一份报告。

list.en: They told me that the meeting had been cancelled.
list.cn: 他们告诉我会议取消了。

list.en: My suggestion is to cancel the meeting.
list.cn: 我的建议是取消会议。

list.en: How long will it take to finish the preparation work?
list.cn: 准备工作要多长时间才能完成?

list.en: Are there any show regulations?
list.cn: 有表演规定吗?

list.en: Should we wear our badges at all times?
list.cn: 我们应该一直带着警徽吗?

list.en: Have you prepared the guidebook?
list.cn: 你准备好旅游指南了吗?

list.en: Can we set up the stand now?
list.cn: 我们现在可以摆好展台了吗?

list.en: What do you think of our booth?
list.cn: 你觉得我们的摊位怎么样?

list.en: Is there any possibility that we could have a spot in the front somewhere?
list.cn: 有没有可能让我们在前面找个位置?

list.en: Please paste up these posters on the walls in the surrounding hallways.
list.cn: 请把这些海报贴在周围走廊的墙上。

list.en: All exhibits should be ready by the opening hour of the exhibition.
list.cn: 所有展品必须在展览开始前准备好。

list.en: Do you think it would be better to move the signboard a little more to the right?
list.cn: 你觉得把招牌再往右挪一点会不会好一点?

list.en: I'm sure we can arrange it before then.
list.cn: 我相信我们可以在那之前安排好。

list.en: We have to order a glass display counter.
list.cn: 我们得订一个玻璃展示台。

list.en: What are their unique functions?
list.cn: 它们的独特功能是什么?

list.en: This is our newest invention.
list.cn: 这是我们的最新发明。

list.en: This product is the result of our latest technology.
list.cn: 这种产品是我们最新技术的成果。

list.en: This new product is popular in European market.
list.cn: 这种新产品在欧洲市场很受欢迎。

list.en: I'm really glad to introduce our new product.
list.cn: 我很高兴向大家介绍我们的新产品。

list.en: Our product is sure to win out over all those of our competitors.
list.cn: 我们的产品一定会胜过所有竞争对手的产品。

list.en: This is a new product in our market.
list.cn: 这是我们市场上的新产品。

list.en: This is a revolutionary new product.
list.cn: 这是一种革命性的新产品。

list.en: Let me demonstrate how it is used.
list.cn: 让我演示一下它是如何使用的。

list.en: What would be our projected sale for the next year?
list.cn: 我们明年的预计销售额是多少?

list.en: What would be our profit margin for next year?
list.cn: 我们明年的利润率是多少?

list.en: Let's set up our sales target for next month now.
list.cn: 让我们现在制定下个月的销售目标。

list.en: We will trouble the sale this year.
list.cn: 今年我们将努力销售。

list.en: Let's make a marketing plan together with yearly forecasts of volume with pricing.
list.cn: 让我们制定一个营销计划，以及年度数量和价格预测。

list.en: These figures here represent our expected marketing our objectives.
list.cn: 这些数字代表了我们预期的销售目标。

list.en: The sales target seems a long way off at the moment.
list.cn: 目前看来，实现销售目标还很遥远。

list.en: Our sales reach the target and the customer reaction is good.
list.cn: 我们的销售达到了目标，顾客的反应很好。

list.en: Reaching our sales goals this quarter is a long shot.
list.cn: 要达到本季度的销售目标是不太可能的。
